channel.title: Webcomic on Natnater
channel.description: Recent content in Webcomic on Natnater

item.title: Webcomics - August 2024
item.description: When designing my Time Block journal for work, I included a 4-panel “Daily Doodle” section in an attempt to reconnect with my inner child (I wanted to be a cartoonist when I was a kid). Here are my daily comics for August of 2024 (featuring a surprise guest: July 31, 2024!) 07/31/24 08/01/24
